title: Simulation Learning Course for Strengthening Online-Based Civic Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and experience in social participation
context.additional_context: Project-based learning centered on citizen participation scenarios in mixed reality environments utilizing personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can design solutions to community problems using various digital media
Learners evaluate their ability to actively participate in democratic decision-making processes through VR simulations
Learners acquire the process of planning, executing, and evaluating citizen-led projects using online collaboration tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
